website_summaries.verdict: An amazingly convenient and durable cocktail table that works well in any setting.
pros: Compact size and portability make this table a great fit for many different party or bar settings
Both base and post are well made
cons: Base can become wobbly if not regularly tightened

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my classroom. It's a nice table, and I love that I have the option of changing the height. I am a little concerned because the top just sits on the pole and I worry it will fall off, but we haven't had any problems. It's sturdy and seems to be able to handle 9 year olds working on it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great tables
customer_reviews.text: We are a professional event company, these are great and industry standard tables, i am shocked at the high quality finish, we normaly order ours from a distributor who just leaves the top raw (which we do not mind because you always finish a table with a cloth) but with these you could put them out as is they are so clean and nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was a really great value for what it cost us
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a really great value for what it cost us. It’s really sturdy, heavy-duty, easy to assemble (3 pieces: base, leg, top), and a good size. It comes with 2 different height legs, which makes it really versatile. We used it for our wedding and will continue to use it in our basement as a snack/conversation table. Nice for playing cards.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Willett

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile table
customer_reviews.text: I had rented 2 of these for a holiday party i was hosting and liked them enough to buy them. They’re easy to assemble and store for when we’re having a party or just need some extra tables and easy to store when not in use. They work great in our bar area at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Catana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with a round cloth for my tree!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table to put my four and a half foot tree on for Christmas. I wasn't finding anything locally and the stores were getting crazy. So, once again, I turned to Amazon to solve my problem and sure enough, it did! This table is perfect with a round cloth for my tree. It put it at just the right height and made room for lots of presents underneath. It went together easily and was stable throughout the whole holiday season...even with two full-size curious cats climbing around. At the end of the season, it came apart and packed away neatly for next year, or if I need it for something between now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Easley for Blue Cat Review

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these from Amazon! Got used ones.
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought two of these tables, both obviously have been used before, visible scratches on one table top and on both the feet. Probably some a-hole ordered it for his/her party and returned it afterwards and Amazon just sends these to the next customer. The tables themselves are soso. The feet can't be adjusted for uneven ground, which is VERY annoying, the table tops are laminated, so will probably hold up okay. The overall construction is sturdy, but since the feet can't be adjusted, you'll have to carefully place them. Okay product, but highly put off that I got used tables for price of new. Shame on Amazon which is handling shipping/returns for these.
customer_reviews.author: cug

customer_reviews.title: Super easy assembly and it's stable
customer_reviews.text: The product was great. Even a little better than expected. It was very easy to assemble, and it was nice and stable. There is no need of tools since you just twist in the top and bottom to whichever post you choose to use for desired height. I almost paid a tradeshow rental company $430 to rent the same thing for 3 days (that's what they charge), but I realized I could send this to the hotel directly and they delivered it right to my booth. Along with a spandex skirt, the product was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S

customer_reviews.title: Great stand up table for working from home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, cheap, fairly stable stand up table. With having to work from home now, I needed something I could use that wouldn’t take up too much space in my one bedroom apartment. I already had bar type chairs so I wanted something that would match. This fit the bill. I only weigh 110 lbs so I needed something I could assemble by myself! Works great and I got the larger diameter size so I could fit my laptop, mouse, papers to write on. Still have a little room left if needed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie M

customer_reviews.title: A sour apple.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this order. I understand that I was purchasing an item thats “used, like new” but if anyone knows this product the presentation of the top of the table is most important. Seller should have indicated these deep scratches visibly easily on the table top. If the scratches was at bottom, that would have been easier to deal with. If the polls where a dented even that is workable. But these huge scratches on the top? How can I display this table pridefully? Seller please be more descriptive. Displeased!!
customer_reviews.author: Sensational

customer_reviews.title: Wobble wobble
customer_reviews.text: Aluminum legs are polished and look great however my table will not sit flush on the ground..rocks back and forth and there is no way to level it out. There are metal feet..no plastic will need to add something to the bottom of the feet to protect floors...would be nice to have a way to secure tabletop to pole..it just spins and when you want to pick up the table to move your losing either the base or the top..small changes could makes this product even better... I have to return my 36" table because of the wobble
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D. Grasham

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid tables, but hard to move around
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these tables and coordinating tablecloths for a university event. They are easy to assemble and look great, however, they have no hardware to secure them (so the bar just sits on the table legs, and the top just sits on the bar), so they are difficult to move easily. We have to partially remove the tablecloth, then disassemble before moving to different rooms. That said, they are easier to store because they come apart without needing tools.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable table
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small table that would fit some bar stools we already had. I like that this table adjusts in height. It was not hard to put together, but it was awkward due to the size and weight of the table top. Once it was together, it fit the bill and has been a great addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Newmark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a side table next to the bed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table for a guest bedroom next to the bed. This was a tight fit, but this table was just the right size, and I was able to cover it with a tablecloth and topper to hold a lamp. It is very stable, does not wobble and sturdy enough to hold the weight of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Goes together easily, takes down easily, seems sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: The 3 I bought all go together easily, and they seem plenty sturdy as far as I can tell. I did read some reviews saying to turn the top to "lock" it once you have it seated, and this does seem to have addressed any wobble of the top. If you're putting this on not-perfectly-level ground (i.e. outdoors), you will likely need to shim the feet some to ensure no wobble at the feet. But that's a function of the ground, not the table. Would be nice if the feet were adjustable by turning, though -- note that they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: 36" table is not stable
customer_reviews.text: I get this table for a party after reading lots and lots of happy reviews. I believe the buyers were happy with the smaller tables. This table does NOT required any hardware for assembly! You just put a 36" top on its column! That is all. The top is spinning, and wobbles. I would never risk putting anything on that table. Maybe it is possible to improve the design by myself, I decided not to try. Returned it to Amazon. Had a hard time packing it back. Regret this purchase, will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this table--it was very easy to put together. The only thing I have a little trouble with is that the columns are kind of odd heights for my counter height chair--the 30 is a little too short to use with the stool but is too high for regular chairs and the 42 is too high--more like standing height. I am going to have to buy new stools to go with it. But the size of the table top is nice and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well-built
customer_reviews.text: I often rent cocktail tables for parties. The rentals are around $20 each. I decided to buy some of these and save money in the long run. These are actually the same quality and heavy-duty nature as the rental tables. They come apart easily for storage. I like that they have a short and tall option for table height (though I likely will never use the short version).
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Too tall and too short
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I thought it would be. The outside of the box was in good shape, but when opened, every thing was loose in the box. A small chunk was missing from the underside of the table. Doesn't affect the look of the top side though. The 40" is a little too tall for what I wanted, my bar stools are too short, so make sure you measure, and the 30" is way too short, my stools are too tall. I would NOT recommend cutting the pole down. I think it is to flimsy and you'll end up with either a crushed or damaged pole.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kiehl

customer_reviews.title: Open box and put together
customer_reviews.text: This table is great! I just opened the box and put it together with the shorter leg. really took about 5 min. After putting it together, I was throwing away the box and noticed the instructions. They are in pictures and if you didn't' know it was a table it would be easy to follow. Simply set the legs down put in the pole then put the table on top. After the table is on top you turn it until it fits snuggly. That's it! Very sturdy and nice small table for my kitchen dining combo.
customer_reviews.author: David and Dawna Stout

customer_reviews.title: Don’t lean on it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had chairs to match this for over a year and was finally able to buy a matching table! It’s perfect as my new dining set for my husband and I. However, we did have to figure out a way to make it a little sturdier. We’re used to putting our arms or elbows on our tables but with this one, we can’t because the tabletop might pop off. We decided it would help us learn our manners haha other than that great table for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lynk

customer_reviews.title: Nice bistro table
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in my small kitchen and provides extra seating area. Good quality for the money. Took minutes to assemble. Comes with two height bars for tall or short. I used the tall with wooden bar stools but can quickly exchange it out for the shorter bar if I need for some reason. People use it all the time, for sitting with their laptop, chatting or just a place to set down their beverages. It fits right up against my kitchen window, and I can sit, have a snack and look outside.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: stable table!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of renting this type of table for our events, I bought them for almost the same price. They are stable, no tipping, and looked great with a floor length table cloth. Super easy to assemble and easy to store for future use. I used them with 30" barstools, but they can also be assembled with the shorter leg for use with a standard chair.
customer_reviews.author: cjo

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a standing desk, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of standing desks on Amazon before buying this, and I'm happy with my choice: It has 4 legs instead of a big circular base, which makes it possible to put your chair as close to it as you want, and also put it beside other furniture (See my photo). The table has good material and is sturdy and durable. Also big enough that I'm using it as my standing workstation. Assembly/disassembly is ridiculously easy (it's literally just 3 pieces) and the box is compact-ish so I kept it around for later when I wan to move.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I’ve purchased these tables for both my entertainment venue and art studio. They are so versatile. So easy to change from high top to tabletop size. Lightweight. Easy to move and assemble. Travel well. I purchased a black tablecloth through Amazon that is tight fitting and sleek. It slips over the top and attaches to the legs. Perfect for catering and entertaining. Have also used without cloth. Top is light color wood veneer with a glossy finish. Really happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: We liked that the center poles are changeable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these 30 inch round tables for an outdoor party on our lanai. The table assembles in about a minute, with no tools. We liked that the center poles are changeable. We used the taller poles for our party, for people to congregate around to talk and have a place to set plates and drinks. The finish on the table tops do not match exactly and are probably meant to be covered. We purchased two round 108 inch table cloths that came very close to the ground, (without dragging), which hid the tops, pole and leg stand almost completely, for a beautiful finished look. We highly recommend these versatile portable tables!
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: Great table for events
customer_reviews.text: These are great for parties and events. The only reason I gave it four stars is due to the legs and table top are not very sturdy. The table almost toppled over when a guest of mine leaned on it. As long as your forewarn guests to not lean on it, it’s great! I purchased the white covers from Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: HouTexas

customer_reviews.title: Products arrived scratched and are obviously used.
customer_reviews.text: I think these will work fine for my party but I ordered 2 and one of them is obviously "used" The base is scratched in many places and has a dirty sticky residue from where a label/sticker was removed. The other one has light scratches on the base. I don't have time to return it and receive a replacement in time for my party but I am definitely not impressed that I paid this much for USED products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This table is sturdy. We bought a black table cloth that covers ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy. We bought a black table cloth that covers the whole thing and legs and it works exactly as we needed it. We take this to tradeshows and use it to display a table monitor. Good height and size. Just think the color of the wood and quality of the edges was little cheap looking (the cover made the difference). Ours came with a few chips around the edge.
customer_reviews.author: maplesyrup

customer_reviews.title: So easy, so sturdy, So good to own!
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can have 2 sizes of these tables. SUPER SUPER EASY to put together and very sturdy! I host A LOT of parties and I'm so glad I purchased these instead of renting all the time. I kept them in their boxes because they fit nicely in the basement all stacked up and then I can use them anytime when I host get togethers at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Conn

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this, table
customer_reviews.text: This table has two,poles one for,a normal table size to fit with chairs,,and another longer pole,for a high top table,to fit WIth bar stools,..I would recommend this,table..I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: priscilla grondin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little table. We sit and have coffee on our sun porch and this is perfect. It is sturdy and just the right size. It also make a great little work desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tables
customer_reviews.text: These tables look great in our pool table / rec room area. They are very versatile because you can adjust the height. We have two bar stools that are bar height and two that are counter height. Now we have matching tables that are the correct height for both types of bar stools. I would purchase these again. The table top is light colored.
customer_reviews.author: SQL4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The base of the cocktail table was very sharp to touch in the edges if each side. The metal Baer was very scratched and made my hands black to touch and put it together. I cleaned but do not think it should arrived this way.
customer_reviews.author: SaundraVoll

customer_reviews.title: Love this table and would give it a five star ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this table and would give it a five star but it is unbalance......it's keep rocking and to use it I have to put something under it, but apart from that it's beautiful. Delivery was fast though.
customer_reviews.author: Janet James

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a nice looking table! I bought this for my classroom and it is a fantastic addition! A little wobbly, but nothing too serious or that can't be fixed with a small piece of cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: SummerLoving

customer_reviews.title: Table Good, Packaging not so Good
customer_reviews.text: We now have three of these tables; they are quite nice, just what we were looking for in redecorating our yacht club. I had ordered two earlier, and based on what I saw, I ordered a third. One concern: the box arrived with one side open, and a tear in the cardboard. The item was not damaged, but easily could have been. It should have been secured with stronger tape.
customer_reviews.author: Maritime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: love this little table!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble. No tools required. Looks perfect in my kitchen with other stainless steel items. Covered the top with small square tablecloth to match curtains. Sturdy and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great for parties.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble/disassemble and to store. Needs table cloth but easy to find. Minor issue - feet aren't adjustable so on uneven surfaces you need to use a wedge etc. But that's fine at this price.
customer_reviews.author: PeterC

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my balcony. THe fact I can repurpose later with a different size is exciting. Great quality, super easy to assemble. Packed well.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyne

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble, disassemble, sturdy. We used this to put a unity candles at our wedding. We bought the white sleeves to put on the table. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Rika

customer_reviews.title: Now My desk
customer_reviews.text: This table is the right height for standing at my computer and I have a chair that lifts to the right height for sitting at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Durable inexpensive bar table - recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table, not too big, not to small. We use it in our basement bar and have zero problems with stability; it doesn’t wobble or tip. If you smoosh the table top onto the base hard enough it shouldn’t be unstable. The top doesn’t screw on to the base, but if you push it down it’s held on, in fact I think I’d have difficulty getting it off. The finish is durable albeit shiny. Planning on purchasing a second table to put in the corner of the billiards rooms for a place to set drinks. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the table to display a Cake for a 50th birthday party this past weekend. I didn't open the box until the day of the party. Needless to say I was very disappointed. The table was dirty and the base was all scratched up. Not what I expected for a NEW item. Sad because it is a nice table, especially with the cover I purchased very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: No tools required
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up! You can use either the 42" pole or the 30" pole. This table looks so pretty and delicate yet it's totally sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very cool table works great as display holder! Fits nice, it's sturdy and not wobbly it's easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: rodolf

customer_reviews.title: One was perfectly fine. The other was missing the 42" pole (just ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two "Used-Very Good" condition tables trough Amazon Warehouse. One was perfectly fine. The other was missing the 42" pole (just had the 30" poles) and I had to return it. Would have given 3 stars for the disappointing experience, but Amazon complaint compartment gave me $10 off a new, replacement table for my troubles. Replacement table was fine, so I'm happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: What I was expecting, pretty good for the price, wooden top is kinda rough and not the nicest but pretty good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Crepeau

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy table which at bar height is important. The chrome is a bit industrial so we’re going to paint it. The top is a blonde oak. All in all, a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: jennifer wignall

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table.. I got the 30inch.. good for two folks to eat and or food table.. it comes with a smaller bar as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table. Base is sturdy. This is not fine furniture, but we have it in our breakfast room right now and it looks great. We plan to take it in our camper, which is so easy because it comes apart and stows away! For the price, I was surprised how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: C'est la vie

customer_reviews.title: Product missing a piece. Amazon missing enough help options.
customer_reviews.text: Item would be a 5 star if it came with all pieces. It is/was missing the 30" column, and the number I am supposed to call does not go through. Amazon does not give enough options to work through this issue, so Amazon gets a 2 star as well, on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: Top of table feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Need them for commercial use, legs and post seem sturdy but not the table top. Feels flimsy & weak. Sometimes we don't use linens with them, I have a feeling like they will scratch/chip off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great tables
customer_reviews.text: Love these tables! We finally decided to buy some after renting them for awhile. Great investment and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: This product looks amazing and is going to look fantastic in my classroom. The only upsetting part about this is the quality of the table on the bottom. I took it out of the box, on the floor, and there was a gash on the bottom and a small part of the table has started to come apart. Also, the bottom part of the table is very scuffed up (this could've been done by transportation).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice office table
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small conference table for my office at work, and this table is perfect. It's neutral enough to fit with any office decor and small enough to be functional and not take a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: B. Murch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bistro table
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and disassemble. Perfect for many occasions. Sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Lake_lj

customer_reviews.title: Better than renting them
customer_reviews.text: I had been hauling and renting these then discovered these. Best buy ever. Come apart easily for storage and fit in my car. I've used both heights for different kinds of events.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for events. Really happy with these. Easy to put together and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn WN

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. It does exactly what it's suppose to
customer_reviews.text: The tables are very well constructed. Comes with a 30" stem, & a 42" stem. Very sturdy. It does exactly what it's suppose to. One of the products I received was damaged. So I will give this product 5 stars if they take care of it in a quick efficient manner.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: It figures i recieve one with mark in the wood top
customer_reviews.text: I know it's not from Raymour Flanigan but Jesus Christ send me one without a imperfection in it and in the most obvious spot
customer_reviews.author: romano peros

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: These tables were purchased for my condo building's party room. They are very easy to set up and very sturdy. They also store in very little space. They've already been used for a couple of parties and getting very positive comments.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Grade at Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I have rented these exact tables from an event rental company in the past. They are very nice, stable and sturdy. Would not hesitate to recommend them to others. Others had mentioned the surface of wood was not good on all. Mine were perfect! Free shipping was great because they are heavy as I ordered four of them. They were packaged really well.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda M. Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Cheap make with zero Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: YOu can't make this any less sturdier. Poorly made product. WIsh I could have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Selva Mohan

customer_reviews.title: Great little cocktail table
customer_reviews.text: This table look about a minute to put together and it seems pretty decent for the price. NOTE: It doesn't have glides, so get felt pads or one of those stretchy cocktail table covers that wraps under the base.
customer_reviews.author: LAnne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these tables. Super easy to install and comes apart easy for storage. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to use for lawn cocktail parties. One box came ripped and open, I accepted it anyway. Each table has 4 parts, tabletop, base and two columns: 1 bistro height and 1 standing height. No tools are required for assembly. They seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri M

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Loved these tables! I would usually rent them, but I’m so glad to find these and actually own my own tables! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rocquelle Devine

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This is a good investment to take out in parties and store after. Instead of renting every time
customer_reviews.author: amazonshoppermom

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made with cosmetic defects
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material, unstable, poorly made. No secure attachment. Only slide in connection which means the top comes out once you want to move it.
customer_reviews.author: jores sarkisyan

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this is sturdy, easy to put together. i like it for the money. it does however scratch easy. so i keep it out of the sun so i do not notice the scratches. i like the idea of having two posts. so later if i want a highboy table all i have to do is change the post.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table is Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. We rent these tables for my business and they are a great money maker.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shires

customer_reviews.title: You will laugh when you see how easy it is to put this together.
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to set up, it took about 10 seconds. But there were a few scratches on the edge, and strange bluish streaks on the top that can't be removed. I decided to keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice table! It was a little dirty, but easy to assemble! The top is glossy which is a nice touch, but keep in mind to buy pads for the bottom of the legs because they did not come in the box.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Ease of assembling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect parts. It doesn't even need any instruction. Easy to put together and take apart...Quite steady on my wooden floor...
customer_reviews.author: Art Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Practical and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great table so far. Practical and versatile. I use it for trade shows and presentations and use the lower tube setting as a small conference table in my office. I wish it comes with floor protectors at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: K LO QUE

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't snap together
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't actually snap together. It fits, but is slides into place precariously and can't actually be moved once assembled- you need to entirely disassemble it, or risk it falling apart as you carry it. Frustrating user experience that caused some damage to other household items when it, you know, fell apart in the middle of being moved.
customer_reviews.author: doesn't write many reviews

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: One of my tables is missing the long pole and 2 of the tables are damaged.
customer_reviews.author: akshay

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Instant Table
customer_reviews.text: Great table for a tradeshow. It was easy to put together and take apart. No tools required. I will use it on our deck when we have parties. Great place to put a few drinks. Four can comfortably stand around it. Three bar stools fit around it.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good quality table very easy to assemble and transport
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I so glad and happy
customer_reviews.text: I so glad and happy, that I chose these tables! Price perfect and they looking really good!Later will update with pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Table was to big to used as a cocktail table Very nice table .
customer_reviews.author: Rubella Utendahl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Great for a party! Perfect for appetizers & cocktails. Also, super easy to store. I have four of these stored under my sectional with all parts. Great buy - cheaper than renting & now I own to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Working Household

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: Looks used, not good quality at all, came damaged but not worth sending back. The only good thing is the assembly sas very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used in our full service hotel catering department. For a of reaction of the cost of our previously purchased tables and the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Priss

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price!! Two height options is a great benefit. The taller height is perfect for stand up conversation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased these to use for tailgating and couldn't be happier. They take maybe 25 seconds to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to use for tailgating and couldn't be happier. They take maybe 25 seconds to set up and another 25 seconds to break down. Also they are super sturdy. Really pleased with the tables, can't wait to see what else we can use them for!
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and sturdy. I own a wedding venue and was tired of renting from local companies so I found these and they work perfectly! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Especially if portability is needed.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy enough, but comes apart very easily (which is great for our portable church environment). Very attractive top - so much that we sent back the table cloth we had gotten for it since it looked great without a cover.
customer_reviews.author: E Bird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect party table.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store, assemble, and unassemble. Everyone loved using them. Perfect size. The 2 different pole heights make it ideal for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Table is great for parties and very sturdy. Better than the rental tables.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S. Crane

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table for the little corner of my office
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the little corner of my office. The set up was amazingly easy as well. No screws, just the 3 pieces that all fit in together. I am very happy with this table!
customer_reviews.author: Neesy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Dual Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this table to use in my sunroom with my tall counter chairs. Perfect for two or three chairs. I also like the additional shorter 30" column because I can use it in the house as an extra table for company. The light oak color on top is a nice feature. Other brands I looked at were all aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Babs55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived promptly in ideal condition. Easy to store and move around. Versatile I bought 4 of them over the course of a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Work well for anyone who has lots of parties. We use them outdoor in the backyard. Much better than renting, we've earned the value back after 4 uses
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: too industrial
customer_reviews.text: Not for a home but more for an event. Not cozy not nice. Came super fast and put it together fast too but it's very industrial. Buy it for a wedding or something.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Gift

customer_reviews.title: Tall high top reasonable priced.
customer_reviews.text: perfect height and looks clean and simple. lightweight high top with 30 inch diameter table. not designed for heavy objects or to be leaned on, but will hold drinks and light meals. fits the requirements and should be used with a tablecloth. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work. They are awesome. Light weight and easy to put together. Love the two heights too.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: A new replacement top.
customer_reviews.text: One table is not finished as you can see on the pictures. It has a ruff plastic coating that can not be removed. Plz we can not use in our lounge this way. We need a replacement ASAP. American Legion Post 76 Arlington Wa
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the parties we have at our business. They are great. Easy to assemble and store. Much better than renting!
customer_reviews.author: R. Chinery

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The table was flawed on top, with bubbled areas and scratches in polyurethane finish. I will say it was the perfect size and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma joy

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 24'' Round Wood Cocktail Table with 30'' and 42'' Columns
product_meta.description: Size:24 in.This versatile commercial grade Cocktail Table features a standard table height column and bar height column. The two column options allow you to optimize your resources when setting up different events. Enhance the look of the bar table configuration by adding a table cover and a loosely tied coordinating material. Table breaks down for easy transporting and organized storing. Cocktail tables can be used in banquet halls, conference centers, hotels, bars, clubs, training rooms, break rooms or any other social event.
